thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com
thread.title: lisa fortino

author: lisa fortino
title: lisa fortino
text: Having spent hours researching and trying to sort code.. as a newbie I became stuck with editing and code and hit a wall.. Thank goodness for Maya.. She understood the problem, even ignored the fact when I told her it wasnt desperate and to put a ticket in - (as I didnt want to waste her time) - she said to hold on for five mins.. and then she sorted it! 8 hours of my day today trying to figure that out.. and she did it in two minutes! What a great company with such patient online help - as I learn more each day - they are there to guide me. Couldn't ask for more on this new business path I am on :-)
